interaction_summary:

Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties Hair Accessories Set For Girls and Women,Large Retractable Cotton,18 Colors 36 Pieces.
Review Date: 2020/08/13
Store: Qiray
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582479'}
Review Text: The pack comes with 18 pairs of hair bands of multicolors. These bands are colorful and pretty. They are a great hair accessory for girls. They can match the color of the hair bands with their dress color. There is a huge variety of colors to choose from. Every color comes with a pair in order to provide for 2 pony tails or 2 braids. For such a huge pack, the price is reasonable. It forms a great hair band set to mix and match the colors as per the attire.
Review Title: Mega pack of colorful hair ties to mix and match...
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Conair Quick Twist; Bonus Pack Conair ['Create quick, fun, styles with the Conair Quick Twist Bonus Pack. The Quick Twist Bonus Pack makes it easy to create beautiful, colorful twisty braids in seconds. Get creative and get your twist on! The Quick Twist allows you to create perfect braids in just 3 easy steps. First, push up the button to raise the hair clasp. Insert end of hair strand under and release button. Repeat on either side. Pull strands away from head and slide switch up to rotate twists. Lastly, rotate by hand, in the direction of the arrow on the styler, to create a perfect twisty braid. Twist it all together by adding ribbons, beads and elastics for totally twisted one-of-a-kind styles you create yourself. The Quick Twist Bonus includes 40 Scunci anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips, 2 silky threads, 10 large hair clips, 1 strand of pearls, 1 sequin ribbon, 1 Conair Wet Dry Detangling Brush, 1 Conair Section and Style Comb, 2 Scunci Silicone Headbands, 4 Scunci Solid Knotted Ponytailers and 4 Scunci Animal Print Knotted Ponytailers. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).'] {'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 4 x 9.88 inches; 13.86 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CD205TV', 'UPC': '074108332424', 'Manufacturer': 'Conair'} Pros:-
1)It makes twists of hair in braids that are cool, beautiful & trendy.
2) It is good for creating hair patterns for parties and special occasions.
3) The kit includes 40 anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips.
4) The product runs with 2 AA batteries that is not included in the package.
Cons:-
One has to twist it by hand for 2 stranded twists. Works ok.. Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} This pack comes with 1000 multi colored and 1000 black rubber bands. They stretch well and can accommodate all the hair without pulling or damaging it. They can be used to tie at the end of a braid or for pony tails. They are colorful and could be matched with the dress color. For a simpler look, you could go with the black bands. They are a great hair ties especially for girls would love them. They came in a bulk pack that would last for a long time. Stretchy colorful hair bands.. Qiray Hair Ties Hair Accessories Set For Girls and Women,Large Retractable Cotton,18 Colors 36 Pieces. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user is highly invested in hair styling, prioritizing creativity and trendiness for special occasions and events.

- **Product Preferences:** Their latest purchase of a colorful hair accessories set reinforces a desire for versatile and aesthetic hair tools. This choice highlights a preference for practical accessories that allow for creativity in matching hairstyles with outfits. 

- **Usage Context:** The user primarily employs hair styling tools for events, seeking efficient, effective solutions that prioritize hair health while providing decorative flair.

- **Performance Expectation:** The user maintains a balanced expectation regarding effectiveness, as indicated by a higher satisfaction rating of 5.0 for their new purchase. This suggests a growing appreciation for functionality that meets their style requirements.

- **Ratings Insight:** Their satisfaction ratings previously averaged around 3.0 to 4.0; however, recent experiences show a shift towards greater contentment, particularly with colorful and practical options.

- **User Engagement Style:** Engagement reflects a thoughtful evaluation of product aesthetics and functionality, as demonstrated by consistently seeking versatile solutions that enhance styling possibilities. The latest feedback emphasizes the user's inclination toward vibrant, mix-and-match items that complement their creative approach to hair styling for different settings.

This updated profile captures the user's evolving preferences, emphasizing their commitment to stylish, functional, and versatile hair accessories for a wide range of occasions.
